**from the website ** whether you decide to dress up or dress down you ll need one of these purses in fact you re going to need several **skill level ** intermediate **note ** there is also a knitted purse pattern in the same leaflet/page **materials ** tlc® essentials™ art e514 6 ounce solid/4½ ounce multicolor skeins

* *version ii * 3 ounces no 2855 navy ca 1½ ounces no 2840 med lake blue cb handle darice #1972-09 button 7/8 diameter
